derivation: from an unused root probably meaning to branch off;
outline:
1. rod, staff, branch, offshoot, club, sceptre, tribe
    1. rod, staff
    2. shaft (of spear, dart)
    3. club (of shepherd's implement)
    4. truncheon, sceptre (mark of authority)
    5. clan, tribe
kjv_def: [idiom] correction, dart, rod, sceptre, staff, tribe.
strongs_def: a scion, i.e. (literally) a stick (for punishing, writing, fighting, ruling, walking, etc.) or (figuratively) a clan
